casebody.data:
ADAMS CREEK ASSOCIATES
v.
DAVIS, et al. 3A08-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 19, 2018 L. Lamar Armstrong, Jr., Attorney at Law, Smithfield, for Adams Creek Associates. James E. Hairston, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Davis, Melvin, et al.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 16th of March 2018 by Defendants:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th of March 2018."

Defendants shall have up to and including the 18th day of April 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
